entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a person who has been practicing the Patronus Charm.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a person who has been practicing the Patronus Charm and has Muggle money to pay for their coffee.

entities.name: patronus charm
entities.description: The Patronus Charm is a spell that Ron and Hermione have been practicing.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who draws his wand along with Ron and the two workmen.

entities.name: workman 1
entities.description: The first workman is a blond and huge person.

entities.name: workman 2
entities.description: The second workman makes identical movements to the first workman.

entities.name: waitress
entities.description: The waitress is a person who heard Ron's comment about the coffee and shot him a nasty look.

relationships.description: Ron has been practicing the Patronus Charm.
Hermione has also been practicing the Patronus Charm.
Harry mirrors the movements of the first workman.
Harry also mirrors the movements of the second workman.
Ron interacts with the waitress by commenting about the coffee.
